main_definition: A person under the age of legal adulthood, or a lesser version/element within something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Below average in importance, seriousness or quality.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her injury was minor compared to others.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person under the legal age of adulthood.
meanings_and_examples.example: He decided to drop out of college because he felt too young and inexperienced at 19.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Lesser or secondary version of something
meanings_and_examples.example: This minor problem won't affect the overall performance of our system.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Small detail that does not change the main outcome.
meanings_and_examples.example: The typo in his speech was a minor error, but it didn't impact its effectiveness.
